articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.title: OpenAI reorganizes research team behind ChatGPT’s personality - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI is shuffling the team that shapes its AI models' behavior, and its leader is moving on to another project within the company.
articles.content:
OpenAI is reorganizing its Model Behavior team, a small but influential group of researchers who shape how the company’s AI models interact with people, TechCrunch has learned.
In an August memo to … [+4189 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Perez, Maxwell Zeff
articles.title: Personalized AI companion app Dot is shutting down - TechCrunch
articles.description: Dot, a personalized AI companion, is shutting down.
articles.content: Dot, an AI companion app that aimed to be a friend and confidante, is shutting down, the company announced on Friday. On a message published on its website, the startup behind Dot, New Computer, said… [+2389 chars]
